bad-fortune.title: bad fortune
bad-fortune.lyrics: i'm happy to go where the algorithm takes us and get told off by vegan-baiting waitress i'll pick my bad fortune right from off of the ground it's worse than that without you i'm no prospect but i'm lonely when i'm with you do you think you'll talk me out of this and hold my head up high do you think i'll just snap out of it and hold my head up high now what comes next on the kitchen disco playlist? it's worse than that the hours drip and the coffee makes us weightless it's worse than that who's wrong, who's right? who cares at all? who's gonna be the last one standing in life's laundromat this is the sticky floor spinning and twirling to a cycle's final roar

birthday-cake.title: birthday cake
birthday-cake.lyrics: yes, i dropped your birthday cake the one that took all night to make i fell down the broken stair the one i should have known was there yes, you make my heart boom i will make your soul shake i really like your outfit "thanks, this dress has pockets" you've got me in a flummox (i've) gone little haywire gave me toni morrison dopamine and carry outs before i met you i was so strung out i was hungry for love so much that it hurt and i know that makes me vulnerable that my ghosts could come back i blocked out the human race they'd become too hard to take i messed up your afternoon suggesting that we get drunk too soon and it sounds like a plot from a cheesy show you give me the courage to lose all control and i know that makes me vulnerable that my ghosts could come back are we good? are we strong? would we stay and like ourselves? i'm done running i'll give it up i'll risk it all i'm good with an unhappy ending as i stood on the corner by the catholic hop just by the lights and the ice cream shop that we guessed was a front for the provisionals they can't get much business my heart beating faster we're about to break up your dad's leather jacket, some money and gum you're moving to london but we'll keep in touch we'll hopefully have this sorted by christmas nothing's certain nothing's certain my ghosts could come back

frontal-lobe-fritz.title: frontal lobe fritz
frontal-lobe-fritz.lyrics:
frontal lobe fritz
it's his break and he deserves it
he orders caribbean spritz
up all night before he saw her
she was a cerebellum twist
wore hypothetical pyjamas
not long now before they kissed
into a sisyphean drama
you put a peccadillo in my mouth
blew a chip without a viable replacement
why did i stumble when i could have won?
i should have taken every chance that i was given
magdalena bliss
she loved snooker and marijuana
wore magenta sliding clips
and made erotic diorama
you put a peccadillo in my mouth
blew a chip without a viable replacement
why did i stumble when i could have run?
i should have taken all my shots without a safety
you put a peccadillo in my mouth
blew a chip without a viable replacement
why did i stumble when i could have run?
i should have taken every chance that i was given

hard-hitter.title: hard hitter
hard-hitter.lyrics: where is brian? "i have no idea" did you ring him? " twice now but no joy" it's nine and we're meant to be on at ten i'd spent most of the day tinfoiling the gweedore stage pinning the band's 8-bit logo behind your kit and sellotaping the seams he was here for soundcheck but now no sign grand form as far as i could make out tensions had been high as was normal for an ep night where the guest list dwarfed the number of skulls that might pay in terry had us on a fixed fee and wasn't happy about having to ring jim to dj at the last minute it was three days later when we found out in the pump street practice room you'd gone home to make something to eat but electrocuted yourself on the cooker because you'd wired it straight into the grid to bypass the meter you were a hard hitter ah-ah you were a zero-fucks giver fugazi, genesis, mozart and bach joke teller of the highest order no one had a bigger or louder laugh like that one time after the show in dublin where we ended up in bray at andy cairns' mansion and you slid down his manicured lawn on an oven tray we fell in a tequila-fuelled heap while he played us the demos for 'the holy bible' or at the hot press awards amped on free heineken you asked bono for a tenner and despite the mortification i was secretly proud at least it wasn't as bad as m asking phil selway how he got that 'high and dry' sound that was the night that t got a taxi home from belfast to derry but left his keys at the bar i made you an a3 cardboard painting of the 'glider ep' in purple and gold metallic and you hung it above your electrolux heater my first exhibition you made homemade speed in celebration in the bathtub cooked to l's recipe that still didn't make ends meet so sometimes you would take the long way round west side stores just to get something to eat you were a hard hitter ah-ah you were a zero fucks giver librarian, libertarian, peace maker librarian, libertarian, peace maker librarian, libertarian, peace maker librarian libertarian hard hitter hard hitter hard hitter the producer thought that we were insane when you summoned us to hazelbank for a reading of the new rules of engagement jamie thought about climbing out the bathroom window because he was shit scared of what would happen next the lamb lay down on christmas eve we stood by your coffin while una played the ink spots and i remembered nailing carpet to the walls that you'd found in a nearby skip and the time liam gallagher's handlers put you in a bin outside the dublin castle because you were getting tasty you were a hard hitter ah-ah you were a zero fucks giver ah-ah you were a hard hitter ah-ah you were a zero fucks giver

it-aint-pretty.title: it ain't pretty
it-aint-pretty.lyrics:
breathe and push, push and breathe
no it ain't pretty
here's a warning i could heed
it ain't pretty
lesson learned
don't wanna be an alternate
i wanna be an awkward fit
get left outside in the cold
silent spring
there are no songbirds here
fog truck killed them off
and got away with it all
this could be my sole talent
to wreak complete havoc
deniers to the left of me
and posers to the right
children listen all
you don't have to fall
cos' what we thought as gospel
turned out to be lies
breathe and push, push and breathe
no it ain't pretty
here's a warning i could heed
but it ain't pretty
lesson learned
don't wanna be an also ran
don't wanna a be a postscript man
who keeps his mouth in control
dirty plays
spraying suburban kids
with man made pathogens
getting away with it all
what will be my sole challenge
what causes most damage
the virus quelled the protests
but just for a time
children listen all
you don't have to fall
what we thought was gospel
turned out to be lies
breathe and push, push and breathe
no it ain't pretty
here's a warning i could heed
but it ain't pretty
breathe and push, push and breathe
no it ain't pretty
no excuses i can plead
no it ain't pretty
yeah

muriel.title: muriel
muriel.lyrics:
you're the cat's meow!
my prime article
muriel - i am sick until i see you
you sway me as you please
you are the knees of bees
muriel - i desperately beseech you
you're almost thirty-three
i've just turned seventeen
muriel i'm certain i can please you
i could wash the sheets
after we've done the deed
muriel - i'm happy to be secret
i tried to list out all of your flaws
it only made things worse
read books to expand my mind
they shrank my universe
my magical ideations 
never seemed to disperse
i've filled up every journal
with unrequited verse
because...
muriel
muriel
you've always been
such a distraction for me
aren't you curious
muriel
if we could be
come on and make me happy
you could shame the stars
i dream of you for hours
muriel - it's obvious you need me
halfway through your degree
denim dungarees
sophisticated woman of no equal
i'd drop all of my friends for you
without any remorse
i'd monitor your parking space
to watch how you reverse
you know just how to hit me 
exactly where it hurts
so i written you this album
where every track just works
you know...
muriel
i'll cause a scene
such a distraction for me
aren't you curious
muriel
don't be so mean
i know i'll make you happy

rad-typo.title: rad typo
rad-typo.lyrics: rad typo continental drift no means no except when it doesn't quite fit, with arbitrary notions i wish for you to have a happy death no drama, instant karma no christmas decorations will be missed just take what you want with you clark gable is sipping lukewarm tea strange cargo i wonder what you dream mary? in brilliant white emulsion? how long? rad typo continental drift no means no except when it doesn't rad typo brenda's your best friend rad typo i hope that you're content and slip and slip

straight-and-narrow.title: straight and narrow
straight-and-narrow.lyrics: geometric lines kept him on the straight and narrow no bleed he worked his pen like a diamond faceter bridgit saved his life kept warm by chiaroscuro his art thrown in a skip by some harried councilmen unprotected by love hailey was a rich kid she never knew what she needed but when he came with solutions she always put him down, put him down, put him down geodesic fires kept him on the straight and narrow no need to mark his friends on a chinese calendar solitary shy kept warm by chiaroscuro his heart held in the grip of a pattern's frequency unprotected by love hailey was a rich kid she never knew what she needed but when he came with solutions she'd always put'em down, put'em down, put'em down georgie was a shy boy georgie was a shy boy he only drew with a felt-tip only drew with a felt-tip he lived his life as a metaphor and they would shoot it down, shoot it down, shoot it down i am certain life's something to prize we are highly evolved we're endangered yet loosely defined in this sock sorting, job-ticking, game-clicking mundanity if we keep it in check it's a salve for humanity hailey was a rich kid she never knew what she needed never knew what she needed but when he came with solutions she'd always put'em down, put'em down, put'em down georgie was a shy boy georgie was a shy boy he only drew with a felt-tip he only drew with a felt-tip he lived his life as a metaphor he lived his life as a metaphor and they would shoot it down, shoot it down, shoot it down

the-one-we-didnt-get-to-record-with-stev.title: the one we didn't get to record with steve albini
the-one-we-didnt-get-to-record-with-stev.lyrics:
i've been sucking on the teet of neoliberalism
for a quarter century or more
i've been blaming all my bad behaviour
for a shot at being interesting
i am lost in the mist of attainment
and a lifelong obsession to win
instead of making my peace with my failures
and sticking with what i've been in
i've been dabbling in the art of misanthropism
in an effort to look like i'm bored
i've been slamming my chips on the table
with a self-destructive frequency
i have harboured the heart of a traitor
a tiger that's lost all its teeth
and now ireland is sleeping with strangers
hell bent on asset stripping
gun
gun
what's that?
has that cat got your gun?
i've been sucking on the teet of neo-liberalism
for a quarter century or more
i've been rubbing shoulders with imperialist scumbags
obsessed with their filth and their scrawl
i've been pushed to the end of my patience
pretending to act like my peers
i reject all their miseducation
i'm sticking with how i'm feeling

vulture-in-the-snow.title: vulture in the snow
vulture-in-the-snow.lyrics:
what should i do now?
with these keys and this wallet
leave them well alone?
or put them back in my pocket
what should i deny?
if i saw him or knew him
staring at his phone
and the smile of his daughter
should i call the police?
should i take these boots off?
i get into the water
every neuron is firing
next to the stray dog
and this canister of carcinogens
i'm trawling through the evidence
i'm scratching for the answer
i am a monster on the throne
i'm clawing through the internet
i'm tearing out these eyeballs
devouring the evidence
i am a vulture in the snow
i am a vulture in the snow
what should i do now?
with these keys and this wallet
leave them well alone?
or put them back in my pocket
what should i do now?
with these @s and these mentions
leave them well alone?
or take a shot at redemption
should i call the police?
should i take these boots off?
i get into the slaughter
every prayer group conspiring
next to the stray dog
and their wind-cheating catechisms
i'm scratching for the answer
i'm baseless and ridiculous
i am a monster on the throne
i'm clawing through the internet
i'm tearing out these eyeballs
devouring the evidence
i am a vulture in the snow
i am a vulture in the snow
i am a vulture in the snow
should i call the police?
should i call the police?
every neuron is firing
i'm trawling through the evidence
i'm scratching for the answer
i'm scraping off my innocence
i am a vulture in the snow
i am a vulture in the snow
i am a vulture in the snow

what-now.title: what now
what-now.lyrics:
say something
more familiar than 'how've you been?'
for too long
i've been waiting so impatiently
what's that you said?
ten more minutes
i think that you can do it
just get out of bed
don't kick at me
or shut the fucking door
i know that you have 
never been this angry or afraid before
what now
do you want some lemonade?
do you want me in or out?
look at all this mess you've made 
what now
what now
you know you're not your thoughts
you can make them what you want
you're the one that's in control
stop feeling
worse than you have any right to feel
for too long 
i've been bypassing this circuitry
better father
bomb diffuser
you bring the chaos
and i'll set up the perimeter
just take as long 
as you think you need
i'll drop the threats of leaving
and watch you brush your teeth
i have spiralled into the blackest
thoughts of my whole life
i see nothing but frustration without any reward
look now
you are made of stronger stuff
you are the best of all i have
you are what i came here for
look now
look now
when things were at their worst
i should have trusted in
our telepathic semaphore

track.key: f major (modulates to c major in bridge)

whats-not-to-like.title: what's not to like
whats-not-to-like.lyrics: i'm on the rocks i'm spitting blood i'm working two jobs i'm in the business of just getting by not punching out not checking in so goddamn lonely can't get to sleep without a bottle of wine what's not to like? what's not to like? (hey!) i'm so ashamed i stayed away i missed his birthday i bought the gift but couldn't make it outside i kept you out to keep it in i'm dying slowly told the truth when there was nowhere to hide what's not to like? what's not to like? (hey!) i'm still the same nothing you say will ever change me nothing can change unless i swallow my pride i'm zoning out it's sinking in i've got to choose now to learn to swim against the pull of the tide what's not to like? what's not to like? (hey!)
